items.title: Development of Web Applications
items.description: Transforming ideas into powerful digital solutions. I specialize in digitizing processes, automating tasks, designing robust databases, and building impactful web applications that effectively solve real-world problems.

items.title: Systems Administration
items.description: Ensuring robust and reliable system operations. I focus on maintaining, backing up, and ensuring servers and systems run flawlessly.

items.title: IT Support
items.description: Providing reliable technical assistance and support. My work involves quickly diagnosing and fixing hardware, software, and network problems to keep operations running smoothly.
